def main():
    x = float(input())
    print(int(round(1000 * (5280/4854) * x)))

main()

import math

x = float(input())

print(math.ceil(1000 * (5280 / 4854) * x))

from sys import stdin

x = float(stdin.readline())

print(int(x*1000*5280/4854 + .5))

from math import ceil

x = float(input())
print(ceil(1000 * (5280 / 4854) * x))
